segments.text: Hi , Mark ! Hi , do you have a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry , Nigel . I'm rushing to a meet right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , no problem . Can we fix a time to talk later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , but this week is crazy for me . Can we make it next Monday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , see you 10 o'clock next Monday !
segments.speaker: S1
